text: Carlton K. Mack, (July 30, 1911, Heshan, Guangdong – April 1995) born Mack Chuck Kwong,Trinidad and Tobago Chamber of Industry and Commerce Business Hall of Fame: 2013: CARLTON K. MACK (1911-1995) was a Chinese businessman who moved to Trinidad and Tobago at a young age where he built the J.T. Allum & Co. business into one of Trinidad and Tobago's largest enterprises. ==See also== * Chinese Trinidadian and Tobagonian * JTA Supermarkets == References == == External links == * Category:1911 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Trinidad and Tobago people of Chinese descent Category:Trinidad and Tobago businesspeople Category:20th-century businesspeople
title: Carlton K. Mack
